resources.string: GetPerms Demo
Enter application ID above
Enter permission name above
Enter search terms
Tap \'Demo Methods Below\' to view
Demo Methods Below
Enter app name
▸ appID(application_name) - get app ID for an app
▸ appSize(application_name) - get app size
Enter application ID
▸ appName(application_id) and getAppIcon(application_id) - get an app\'s name and icon from app ID
▸ getCertHashCode(application_id) - get an app\'s signing certificate\'s hash code
▸ installedOn(application_id) - get an app\'s first installation date
▸ lastUpdated(application_id) - get when an app was last updated
▸ getRequested(application_id) - requested permissions for a specific app
▸ getGranted(application_id) - granted permissions for a specific app
Enter permission name
▸ appsRequesting(permission_name) - get apps requesting a specific permission
▸ appsGranted(permission_name) - get apps granted a specific permission
▸ noOfApps() - get number of apps installed
▸ appID() - lists all apps with their IDs
▸ getRequested() - requested permissions for all apps
▸ appSize() - get app size for all apps
▸ getGranted() - granted permissions for all apps
